feature_model.name: Chinese
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Chinese (f_Chinese) :m Mode (f_Mode) :m EmailFunction (f_EmailFunction) :m English (f_English) :m Choice (f_Choice) :m Language (f_Language) :m ExerciseMode (f_ExerciseMode) :m ShortAnswer (f_ShortAnswer) :m GeneralFunction (f_GeneralFunction) :m Online Exam PL (f_Online_Exam_PL) :m QuestionType (f_QuestionType) :m QuestionAndAnswer (f_QuestionAndAnswer) :o TestMode (f_TestMode) :o TestPaperGeneration (f_TestPaperGeneration) :m Customized (f_Customized) :o SelectedFromRepository (f_SelectedFromRepository) :g [1, *] : SelectedQuestion (f_SelectedQuestion) : RandomizedQuestion (f_RandomizedQuestion)
